EXPERIMENT.TITLE: Illumina HiSeq 2500 paired end sequencing of SAMD00114846

DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: metagenomic data from human fecal samples
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: Total microbial community DNA was isolated from the fecal samples of Japanese patients who underwent colonoscopy at National Cancer Research Center. The study population contains health, early and advanced cancer stages.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: Total microbial community DNA was isolated from the fecal samples of Japanese patients who underwent colonoscopy at National Cancer Research Center. The study population contains health, early and advanced cancer stages.

SAMPLE_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: Generic sample from human gut metagenome

RUN.TITLE: Illumina HiSeq 2500 paired end sequencing of SAMD00114846
